Container.Name: nginx-rtmp-multistream
Container.Overview:
Lightweight nginx + rtmp module for replicating streams.
How to stream to the server
Set OBS up with the following settings:
Go to Settings > Stream. Fill out the following settings: Stream Type: Custom Streaming Server. URL: `rtmp://localhost:1935/live` (Replace localhost with the IP of where the server is running.) Stream key: `test` (This can be anything you want.)
How to view the stream
Using VLC:
Go to Media > Open Network Stream. Enter the following URL: `rtmp://localhost:1935/live/test` (Replace localhost with the IP of where the server is running.) Click Play.
More info
GitHub: https://github.com/DvdGiessen/nginx-rtmp-docker
Unraid Blog: https://unraid.net/blog/unraid-streaming-server
Container.Requires: <br>Create directory and download nginx config file: <br>`mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/nginx-rtmp/ && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MountainGod2/nginx-rtmp-docker/master/nginx.conf -o /mnt/user/appdata/nginx-rtmp/nginx.conf` <br>Edit downloaded nginx.conf file to add RTSP stream details and/or change included Twitch samples: <br>`nano /mnt/user/appdata/nginx-rtmp/nginx.conf` <br>
